-0.45833734770827733 0.8793128991060192
-0.5303477780323329 0.8379038798031138

Only the first coordinates coincide (closely) with the non-reversed case, after that there is a difference in coordinates
the first coordinate of the 40nObservations (non-reversed) is (0.6860000000000009 0.7235304000000031) and the 
pre last of the reversed 40nObservations is (-0.45833734770827733 0.8793128991060192) the dist of this two vectors is 1.15489226873667


1.15489226873667 is larger than 0.18233412727523288 (which is the dist calculated after 20 observations for problem 2). So,
when reversing the error is getting larger for larger observations (even faster than for the problem 1 case)
